titles.title: Enhancing Detection of Human Trafficking Act

To direct the Secretary of Labor to train certain Department of Labor personnel how to effectively detect and assist law enforcement in preventing human trafficking during the course of their primary roles and responsibilities, and for other purposes.
Enhancing Detection of Human Trafficking Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Enhancing Detection of Human Trafficking Act
This bill directs the Department of Labor to implement a program to:
train and periodically retrain relevant Labor personnel to detect and assist law enforcement in preventing human trafficking during the course of their primary roles and responsibilities, and ensure that such personnel regularly receive current information on matters related to the detection of human trafficking.
